title: Site login bug.
body:
I first had this bug 2 years ago and it lasted for months and got fixed by it's own don't know how.
I login on LoL client and play normal.
But i cant login on LoL site i even take the username and password and cope them from LoL client to LoL site i login normally on LoL client but on site it says wrong username or password.
I have that bug right now for weeks and i don't know what to do.

replies.body:
Is this affecting a different account than the one you're posting from now? Can you ensure you've [cleared your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) before trying to login?

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nAgGjz0b,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-24T23:39:13.277+0000)
>
> Is this affecting a different account than the one you're posting from now? Can you ensure you've [cleared your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) before trying to login?
> 
> Let me know if this helped.

Oh it worked , thank you , it appears i had more than o.5 GB cached files and 7k browsing data

Don't you need to log in to post on the boards?
How did you make this post? Maybe I'm misunderstanding..

> [{quoted}](name=Code Capitalist,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nAgGjz0b,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-24T14:34:35.875+0000)
>
> Don't you need to log in to post on the boards?
> How did you make this post? Maybe I'm misunderstanding..

I have more than 10 accounts ..
I am posting from my second account.
The account that has the problem is the first account i ever made.
